DOC.brief_summary: A prospective , randomize , double-blind study compare effect ED-71 alfacalcidol fracture incidence
DOC.brief_title: A New Active Vitamin D , ED-71 Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: Osteoporotic patient meet following condition : 1. least one fragility fracture , 2. 70 yearold bone mineral density 70 % young adult mean , 3. bone mineral density 60 % young adult mean Women three year menopause men Current disorder primary hyperparathyroidism , Cushing 's syndrome , gonadal insufficiency , poorly control diabetes mellitus cause secondary osteoporosis A history suspicion active urolithiasis time Use bisphosphonates past 12 month Use medication know affect bone past 2 month Abnormal serum calcium , urinary calcium , serum creatinine liver function test
